column4: Can the game run with no mobile data and no wifi?
column5:
Switch mobile data to off or put the phone in Airplane mode.
Start the game.

column4: Can the user play the game with mobile data on and wifi off?
column5:
Switch mobile data to on.
Switch wifi off.
Start the game
Try and build something
Try and purchase an item

column4: Can the user play the game with mobile data off and wifi on?
column5:
Switch mobile data to off. 
Switch wifi on. 
Start the game 
Try and build something 
Try and purchase an item

column4: Can the user play the game wit mobile data on and wifi on?
column5:
Switch mobile data to on. 
Switch wifi on. 
Start the game 
Try and build something 
Try and purchase an item
column6: The game should run as expected.

column4: Can the game run well when the game is in a poor wireless signal area?
column5:
Switch wifi on. 
Find a location far enough away for weak signal
Start the game 
Try and build something 
Try and purchase an item
column6: The game should still run smoothly.

column4: What happens when a user tries to play the game whilst the servers are down?
column5: 1. When servers are down, try to launch the game.
column6: The user should receive an error to state that the server is unavailable.
